H0.text: Which Shakespeare play features the line: " The play's the thing / Wherein I'll catch the conscience of the king. " ?". Macbeth

H1.text: Which Shakespeare play features the line: " The play's the thing / Wherein I'll catch the conscience of the king. " ?". Othello

H2.text: Which Shakespeare play features the line: " The play's the thing / Wherein I'll catch the conscience of the king. " ?". King Lear

H3.text: Which Shakespeare play features the line: " The play's the thing / Wherein I'll catch the conscience of the king. " ?". HAMLET
